'''Sapphira Boffin, née Brockhouse''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Sapphira married [[Uffo Boffin]] and had two children: [[Gruffo Boffin|Gruffo]] and [[Gerda Boffin|Gerda]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>

==Etymology==
A ''[[wikipedia:Sapphire|Sapphire]]'' is a blue gemstone. The name derives from Greek ''σάπφειρος'' through Latin and Greek.<ref>[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/sapphire#Etymology Wiktionary entry]</ref>
